heading: HR02534
0: RESOLUTION URGING FOR THE IMMEDIATE AND UNCONDITIONAL RELEASES OF PEASANT ACTIVISTS AND RESIDENTS OF NEGROS ORIENTAL, INCLUDING NESTOR KADUSALE, PEASANT LEADER OF KAPUNONGAN ALANG SA UGMA SA GAGMAY'NG MAG-UUMA SA ORIENTAL NEGROS (KAUGMAON) AND AZUCENA GARUBAT, A PEASANT WOMAN ACTIVIST OF NAGHIUSANG MAG-UUMA SA PANUBIGAN (NAMAPA) AND ALSO THE ANAKPAWIS PARTY-LIST CANLAON CITY CHAPTER COORDINATOR, WHOSE ARRESTS COINCIDED WITH THE MASS KILLING OF FOURTEEN PEASANTS IN CANLAON CITY, MANJUYOD AND SANTA CATALINA TOWNS, AS RESULT BY THE JOINT POLICE AND MILITARY OPERATIONS OPLAN SAURON 2PT0

status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-05-20
history:

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING FOR THE IMMEDIATE AND UNCONDITIONAL RELEASES OF PEASANT ACTIVISTS AND RESIDENTS OF NEGROS ORIENTAL, INCLUDING NESTOR KADUSALE, PEASANT LEADER OF KAPUNONGAN ALANG SA UGMA SA GAGMAY'NG MAG-UUMA SA ORIENTAL NEGROS (KAUGMAON) AND AZUCENA GARUBAT, A PEASANT WOMAN ACTIVIST OF NAGHIUSANG MAG-UUMA SA PANUBIGAN (NAMAPA) AND ALSO THE ANAKPAWIS PARTY-LIST CANLAON CITY CHAPTER COORDINATOR, WHOSE ARRESTS COINCIDED WITH THE MASS KILLING OF FOURTEEN PEASANTS IN CANLAON CITY, MANJUYOD AND SANTA CATALINA TOWNS, AS RESULT BY THE JOINT POLICE AND MILITARY OPERATIONS OPLAN SAURON 2PT0
